metadata.author: Jonathan Mathieu
notes: All numerical entries are priors (pre-Hera), not posteriors.
Wide conservative ranges used where conventions may differ.
No post-hoc tuning allowed after tagging v1.2-prereg.

confidence_rationale: Post-DART analyses suggest persistent NPA state at Hera arrival.
Residual probability reserved for rapid damping or misclassification.

gravity_coefficients.convention: Dimensionless zonal/tesseral harmonics; normalization to be matched to Hera reporting standard.

C22.interpretation: Equatorial elongation / triaxiality proxy (broad rubble-pile plausible range).

libration_signature.observable: Time evolution of NPA energy or libration amplitude over Hera observation window.

decay_exponent.interpretation: Power-law decay exponent of excitation amplitude.

cross_output_consistency.definition: Consistency score linking rotational regime, gravity coefficients, and libration signature under pre-registered physical admissibility constraints.

success_conditions.QL_FULL_vs_BASELINE: Improvement in at least two outputs
success_conditions.QL_FULL_vs_QL_ABLATED: Improvement in at least one output

notes: All metrics computed against frozen priors without reweighting.
No structural modification of model variants allowed after tag.
